extension_description.message: An browser extension that allows you to display and counterblock (block) who blocked you on Twitter.

run_chainblock_from_followers_descriptio.message: Run chain block on an account who blocked you among the followers of that account.

run_chainblock_from_following_descriptio.message: Run chain block on an account who blocked you among the accounts you follow.

running_chainblock_is_only_available_on_.message: Chain Block can be used only on Twitter.

please_run_on_profile_page_1.message: To run chain block, please go to your profile page.

options_description.message: Change the settings for the mirror block

block_reflection_description.message: Block reflection: If I see a user who blocked me, I block the user.

outline_user_blocked_me.message: Outline a red border to better see the user who blocked your account.

enable_block_reflection_description.message: If I see a user who blocked me, I block the user.

block_muted_user_description.message: If you turn the option off, it don't block the user you have muted. If you turn this option on, it blocks whether it's muted or not.

always_immediately_block_mode_descriptio.message: Enables the "Block Upon Discovery" feature to default when executing a chain block.

warning_before_close.message: Closing the page or navigating to another page will stop the currently active chain block. Would you like to go on?

chainblock_still_running.message: The chain block is still running. Do you still want to close it?

confirm_mutual_block.message: Do you want to block $count$ users you found?

no_users_to_mutual_block.message: There is no user to block against.

cant_chainblock_they_blocks_you.message: Unable to execute chain block because @$username$ blocked.

chainblock_already_running.message: The chain block is already running.

error_occured_from_twitter_server.message: An error occurred on the Twitter server.

cant_chainblock_they_protected.message: Cannot execute a chain block on private account: @$username$ .

confirm_chainblock_to_followers.message: Do you want to run a chain block on @$username$'s follower list?

confirm_chainblock_to_following.message: Do you want to run a chain block from the list of users that @$username$ follows?

warning_too_many_followers.message: Caution! If you have too many followers/followers, your account may be restricted, such as remitting, during chain block. Are you sure you want to proceed?

chainblock_progress.message: Collected $scraped$ out of $total$, found a total of $found$

chainblock_immediately_block_mode_toolti.message: If you find a user you want to counter-block (without pressing the 'Block' button), you will immediately counter-block.

chainblock_rate_limited.message: Rate Limit: Too many followers. Temporarily restricted.

no_blockable_user.message: There are no users to counter-block.

run_chainblock_from_followers_contextmen.message: Run a chainblock on this user (follower)

run_chainblock_from_following_contextmen.message: Run a chainblock on this user (following)

block_reflected_description.message: Block Reflection Triggered: Mirror Block hits @$username$
